trans-unit.source: Custom TimeSpan format strings
trans-unit.target: 自訂 TimeSpan 格式字串

trans-unit.source: Custom TimeSpan format strings
trans-unit.target: 自訂 TimeSpan 格式字串

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: Custom TimeSpan format strings
trans-unit.target: 自訂 TimeSpan 格式字串

trans-unit.source: A [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) format string defines the string representation of a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value that results from a formatting operation.
trans-unit.target: [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 格式字串會定義對 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值執行格式化作業後所產生的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A custom format string consists of one or more custom [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) format specifiers along with any number of literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 自訂格式字串由一個或多個自訂 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 格式規範和任意數目的常值字元組成。

trans-unit.source: Any string that is not a [standard TimeSpan](standard-timespan.md) format string is interpreted as a custom [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) format string.
trans-unit.target: 所有不是[標準 TimeSpan](standard-timespan.md) 格式字串的字串，都會被解譯為自訂的 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 格式字串。

trans-unit.source: The custom [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) format specifiers do not include placeholder separator symbols, such as the symbols that separate days from hours, hours from minutes, or seconds from fractional seconds.
trans-unit.target: 自訂 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 格式規範不包含預留位置分隔符號，例如分隔天與小時、小時與分鐘或是秒與小數秒的符號。

trans-unit.source: Instead, these symbols must be included in the custom format string as string literals.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，這些符號必須包含在自訂格式字串中作為字串常值。

trans-unit.source: For example, `"dd\.hh\:mm"` defines a period (.) as the separator between days and hours, and a colon (:) as the separator between hours and minutes.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`"dd\.hh\:mm"` 會定義句號 (.) 作為天與小時之間的分隔符號，並定義冒號 (:) 作為小時與分鐘之間的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: Custom [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) format specifiers also do not include a sign symbol that enables you to differentiate between negative and positive time intervals.
trans-unit.target: 自訂 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 格式規範也不包括讓您區分正負時間間隔的正負號。

trans-unit.source: To include a sign symbol, you have to construct a format string by using conditional logic.
trans-unit.target: 若要包括正負號，您必須使用條件邏輯建構格式字串。

trans-unit.source: The [Other characters](#other-characters) section includes an example.
trans-unit.target: [其他字元](#other-characters)一節中會提供範例。

trans-unit.source: The string representations of [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) values are produced by calls to the overloads of the [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) `ToString` method, as well as by methods that support composite formatting, such as [String.Format](xref:System.String.Format(System.IFormatProvider,System.String,System.Object)).
trans-unit.target: [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值的字串表示，藉由呼叫 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) `ToString` 方法的多載而產生，同時也可藉由支援複合格式的方法所產生，例如 [String.Format](xref:System.String.Format(System.IFormatProvider,System.String,System.Object))。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Formatting types](formatting-types.md) and [Composite formatting](composite-format.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化類型](formatting-types.md)及[複合格式設定](composite-format.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of standard format strings in formatting operations.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明格式化作業中的標準格式字串用法。

trans-unit.source: Custom [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) format strings are also used by the [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) and [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) methods to define the required format of input strings for parsing operations.
trans-unit.target: 自訂 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 格式字串也會由 the [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) 和 [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) 方法用來定義剖析作業之輸入字串的必要格式

trans-unit.source: (Parsing converts the string representation of a value to that value.) The following example illustrates the use of standard format strings in parsing operations.
trans-unit.target: (剖析會將值的字串表示轉換成該值)。下列範例說明剖析作業中標準格式字串的用法。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the custom date and time format specifiers.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述自訂日期和時間的格式規範。

trans-unit.source: Format specifier
trans-unit.target: 格式規範

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Examples
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: The number of whole days in the time interval.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中的完整天數。

trans-unit.source: "dd", "dddddddd"
trans-unit.target: "dd"、"dddddddd"

trans-unit.source: The number of whole days in the time interval, padded with leading zeros as needed.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中的完整天數，視需要填補前置零。

trans-unit.source: The number of whole hours in the time interval that are not counted as part of days.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中未計入天數部分的完整時數。

trans-unit.source: Single-digit hours do not have a leading zero.
trans-unit.target: 一位數的小時不會有前置零。

trans-unit.source: "hh"
trans-unit.target: "hh"

trans-unit.source: The number of whole hours in the time interval that are not counted as part of days.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中未計入天數部分的完整時數。

trans-unit.source: Single-digit hours have a leading zero.
trans-unit.target: 一位數的小時有前置零。

trans-unit.source: The number of whole minutes in the time interval that are not included as part of hours or days.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中未納入時數或天數部分的完整分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: Single-digit minutes do not have a leading zero.
trans-unit.target: 一位數的分鐘不會有前置零。

trans-unit.source: "mm"
trans-unit.target: "mm"

trans-unit.source: The number of whole minutes in the time interval that are not included as part of hours or days.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中未納入時數或天數部分的完整分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: Single-digit minutes have a leading zero.
trans-unit.target: 一位數的分鐘有前置零。

trans-unit.source: The number of whole seconds in the time interval that are not included as part of hours, days, or minutes.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中未納入時數、天數或分鐘數部分的完整秒數。

trans-unit.source: Single-digit seconds do not have a leading zero.
trans-unit.target: 一位數的秒不會有前置零。

trans-unit.source: `TimeSpan.FromSeconds(12.965):` `%s --> 12`; `s\.fff --> 12.965`
trans-unit.target: `TimeSpan.FromSeconds(12.965):` `%s --> 12`; `s\.fff --> 12.965`

trans-unit.source: "ss"
trans-unit.target: "ss"

trans-unit.source: The number of whole seconds in the time interval that are not included as part of hours, days, or minutes.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中未納入時數、天數或分鐘數部分的完整秒數。

trans-unit.source: Single-digit seconds have a leading zero.
trans-unit.target: 一位數的秒有前置零。

trans-unit.source: `TimeSpan.FromSeconds(6.965):` `ss --> 06`; `ss\.fff --> 06.965`
trans-unit.target: `TimeSpan.FromSeconds(6.965):` `ss --> 06`; `ss\.fff --> 06.965`

trans-unit.source: The tenths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中的十分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: `TimeSpan.FromSeconds(6.895):` `f --> 8`; `ss\.f --> 06.8`
trans-unit.target: `TimeSpan.FromSeconds(6.895):` `f --> 8`; `ss\.f --> 06.8`

trans-unit.source: "ff"
trans-unit.target: "ff"

trans-unit.source: The hundredths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中的百分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: `TimeSpan.FromSeconds(6.895):` `ff --> 89`; `ss\.ff --> 06.89`
trans-unit.target: `TimeSpan.FromSeconds(6.895):` `ff --> 89`; `ss\.ff --> 06.89`

trans-unit.source: "fff"
trans-unit.target: "fff"

trans-unit.source: The milliseconds in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中的毫秒。

trans-unit.source: `TimeSpan.FromSeconds(6.895):` `fff --> 895`; `ss\.fff --> 06.895`
trans-unit.target: `TimeSpan.FromSeconds(6.895):` `fff --> 895`; `ss\.fff --> 06.895`

trans-unit.source: "ffff"
trans-unit.target: "ffff"

trans-unit.source: The ten-thousandths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中的萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: "fffff"
trans-unit.target: "fffff"

trans-unit.source: The hundred-thousandths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中的十萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: "ffffff"
trans-unit.target: "ffffff"

trans-unit.source: The millionths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中的百萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: "fffffff"
trans-unit.target: "fffffff"

trans-unit.source: The ten-millionths of a second (or the fractional ticks) in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中的千萬分之一秒 (或小數刻度)。

trans-unit.source: The tenths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中的十分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: Nothing is displayed if the digit is zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果數字為零，則不會顯示任何內容。

trans-unit.source: "FF"
trans-unit.target: "FF"

trans-unit.source: The hundredths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中的百分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: Any fractional trailing zeros or two zero digits are not included.
trans-unit.target: 不包含小數點後的零或兩位數都是零的數字。

trans-unit.source: "FFF"
trans-unit.target: "FFF"

trans-unit.source: The milliseconds in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中的毫秒。

trans-unit.source: Any fractional trailing zeros are not included.
trans-unit.target: 不包含小數點後的零。

trans-unit.source: "FFFF"
trans-unit.target: "FFFF"

trans-unit.source: The ten-thousandths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中的萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: Any fractional trailing zeros are not included.
trans-unit.target: 不包含小數點後的零。

trans-unit.source: "FFFFF"
trans-unit.target: "FFFFF"

trans-unit.source: The hundred-thousandths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中的十萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: Any fractional trailing zeros are not included.
trans-unit.target: 不包含小數點後的零。

trans-unit.source: "FFFFFF"
trans-unit.target: "FFFFFF"

trans-unit.source: The millionths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中的百萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: Any fractional trailing zeros are not displayed.
trans-unit.target: 不顯示小數點後的零。

trans-unit.source: "FFFFFFF"
trans-unit.target: "FFFFFFF"

trans-unit.source: The ten-millions of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔中的千萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: Any fractional trailing zeros or seven zeros are not displayed.
trans-unit.target: 不顯示小數點後的零或七位數都是零。

trans-unit.source: 'string'
trans-unit.target: 'string'

trans-unit.source: Literal string delimiter
trans-unit.target: 常值字串分隔符號

trans-unit.source: The escape character.
trans-unit.target: 逸出字元。

trans-unit.source: Any other character
trans-unit.target: 任意字元

trans-unit.source: Any other unescaped character is interpreted as a custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 其他任何未逸出字元都會解譯為自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The "d" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "d" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "d" custom format specifier outputs the value of the [TimeSpan.Days](xref:System.TimeSpan.Days) property, which represents the number of whole days in the time interval.
trans-unit.target: "d" 自訂格式規範會輸出 [TimeSpan.Days](xref:System.TimeSpan.Days) 屬性的值，這個屬性表示時間間隔中的完整天數。。

trans-unit.source: It outputs the full number of days in a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value, even if the value has more than one digit.
trans-unit.target: 它會輸出 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值中的完整天數，即使該值有多個位數也一樣。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the [TimeSpan.Days](xref:System.TimeSpan.Days) property is zero, the specifier outputs "0".
trans-unit.target: 如果 [TimeSpan.Days](xref:System.TimeSpan.Days) 屬性的值為零，規範會輸出 "0"。

trans-unit.source: If the "d" custom format specifier is used alone, specify "%d" so that it is not misinterpreted as a standard format string.
trans-unit.target: 如果單獨使用 "d" 自訂格式規範，請指定 "%d"，以免被錯誤解譯為標準格式字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例提供一個實例。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the "d" custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何使用 "d" 自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The "dd"-"dddddddd" custom format specifiers
trans-unit.target: "dd"-"dddddddd" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "dd", "ddd", "dddd", "ddddd", "dddddd", "ddddddd", and "dddddddd" custom format specifiers output the value of the [TimeSpan.Days](xref:System.TimeSpan.Days) property, which represents the number of whole days in the time interval.
trans-unit.target: "dd"、"ddd"、"dddd"、"ddddd"、"dddddd"、"ddddddd" 和 "dddddddd" 自訂格式規範會輸出 [TimeSpan.Days](xref:System.TimeSpan.Days) 屬性的值，這個屬性表示時間間隔中的完整天數。

trans-unit.source: The output string includes a minimum number of digits specified by the number of "d" characters in the format specifier, and it is padded with leading zeros as needed.
trans-unit.target: 輸出字串會包含格式規範中 "d" 字元數所指定的最少位數，並且視需要填補前置零。

trans-unit.source: If the digits in the number of days exceed the number of "d" characters in the format specifier, the full number of days is output in the result string.
trans-unit.target: 如果天數位數超過格式規範中的 "d" 字元數，則結果字串中的輸出會是完整天數。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses these format specifiers to display the string representation of two [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用這些格式規範，顯示兩個 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The value of the days component of the first time interval is zero; the value of the days component of the second is 365.
trans-unit.target: 第一個時間間隔的天數部分值為零，第二個時間間隔的天數部分值為 365。

trans-unit.source: The "h" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "h" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "h" custom format specifier outputs the value of the [TimeSpan.Hours](xref:System.TimeSpan.Hours) property, which represents the number of whole hours in the time interval that is not counted as part of its day component.
trans-unit.target: "h" 自訂格式規範會輸出 [TimeSpan.Hours](xref:System.TimeSpan.Hours) 屬性的值，這個屬性表示時間間隔中未計入天數部分的完整時數。

trans-unit.source: It returns a one-digit string value if the value of the [TimeSpan.Hours](xref:System.TimeSpan.Hours) property is 0 through 9, and it returns a two-digit string value if the value of the [TimeSpan.Hours](xref:System.TimeSpan.Hours) property ranges from 10 to 23.
trans-unit.target: 如果 [TimeSpan.Hours](xref:System.TimeSpan.Hours) 屬性的值為 0 到 9，則會傳回一位數的字串值；如果 [TimeSpan.Hours](xref:System.TimeSpan.Hours) 屬性的值為 10 到 23，則會傳回兩位數的字串值。

trans-unit.source: If the "h" custom format specifier is used alone, specify "%h" so that it is not misinterpreted as a standard format string.
trans-unit.target: 如果單獨使用 "h" 自訂格式規範，請指定 "%h"，以免被錯誤解譯為標準格式字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例提供一個實例。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, in a parsing operation, an input string that includes only a single number is interpreted as the number of days.
trans-unit.target: 通常在剖析作業中，只包含單一數字的輸入字串會解譯為天數。

trans-unit.source: You can use the "%h" custom format specifier instead to interpret the numeric string as the number of hours.
trans-unit.target: 您可以改用 "%h" 自訂格式規範會，將數值字串解譯為時數。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例提供一個實例。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the "h" custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何使用 "h" 自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The "hh" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "hh" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "hh" custom format specifier outputs the value of the [TimeSpan.Hours](xref:System.TimeSpan.Hours) property, which represents the number of whole hours in the time interval that is not counted as part of its day component.
trans-unit.target: "hh" 自訂格式規範會輸出 [TimeSpan.Hours](xref:System.TimeSpan.Hours) 屬性的值，這個屬性表示時間間隔中未計入天數部分的完整時數。

trans-unit.source: For values from 0 through 9, the output string includes a leading zero.
trans-unit.target: 對於從 0 到 9 的值，輸出字串會包含前置零。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, in a parsing operation, an input string that includes only a single number is interpreted as the number of days.
trans-unit.target: 通常在剖析作業中，只包含單一數字的輸入字串會解譯為天數。

trans-unit.source: You can use the "hh" custom format specifier instead to interpret the numeric string as the number of hours.
trans-unit.target: 您可以改用 "hh" 自訂格式規範，將數值字串解譯為時數。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例提供一個實例。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the "hh" custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何使用 "hh" 自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The "m" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "m" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "m" custom format specifier outputs the value of the [TimeSpan.Minutes](xref:System.TimeSpan.Minutes) property, which represents the number of whole minutes in the time interval that is not counted as part of its day component.
trans-unit.target: "m" 自訂格式規範會輸出 [TimeSpan.Minutes](xref:System.TimeSpan.Minutes) 屬性的值，這個屬性表示時間間隔中未計入天數部分的完整分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: It returns a one-digit string value if the value of the [TimeSpan.Minutes](xref:System.TimeSpan.Minutes) property is 0 through 9, and it returns a two-digit string value if the value of the [TimeSpan.Minutes](xref:System.TimeSpan.Minutes) property ranges from 10 to 59.
trans-unit.target: 如果 [TimeSpan.Minutes](xref:System.TimeSpan.Minutes) 屬性的值為 0 到 9，則會傳回一位數的字串值；如果 [TimeSpan.Minutes](xref:System.TimeSpan.Minutes) 屬性的值為 10 到 59，則會傳回兩位數的字串值。

trans-unit.source: If the "m" custom format specifier is used alone, specify "%m" so that it is not misinterpreted as a standard format string.
trans-unit.target: 如果單獨使用 "m" 自訂格式規範，請指定 "%m"，以免被錯誤解譯為標準格式字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例提供一個實例。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, in a parsing operation, an input string that includes only a single number is interpreted as the number of days.
trans-unit.target: 通常在剖析作業中，只包含單一數字的輸入字串會解譯為天數。

trans-unit.source: You can use the "%m" custom format specifier instead to interpret the numeric string as the number of minutes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以改用 "%m" 自訂格式規範，將數值字串解譯為分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例提供一個實例。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the "m" custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何使用 "m" 自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The "mm" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "mm" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "mm" custom format specifier outputs the value of the [TimeSpan.Minutes](xref:System.TimeSpan.Minutes) property, which represents the number of whole minutes in the time interval that is not included as part of its hours or days component.
trans-unit.target: "mm" 自訂格式規範會輸出 [TimeSpan.Minutes](xref:System.TimeSpan.Minutes) 屬性的值，這個屬性表示時間間隔中未納入時數或天數部分的完整分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: For values from 0 through 9, the output string includes a leading zero.
trans-unit.target: 對於從 0 到 9 的值，輸出字串會包含前置零。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, in a parsing operation, an input string that includes only a single number is interpreted as the number of days.
trans-unit.target: 通常在剖析作業中，只包含單一數字的輸入字串會解譯為天數。

trans-unit.source: You can use the "mm" custom format specifier instead to interpret the numeric string as the number of minutes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以改用 "mm" 自訂格式規範，將數值字串解譯為分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例提供一個實例。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the "mm" custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何使用 "mm" 自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The "s" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "s" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "s" custom format specifier outputs the value of the [TimeSpan.Seconds](xref:System.TimeSpan.Seconds) property, which represents the number of whole seconds in the time interval that is not included as part of its hours, days, or minutes component.
trans-unit.target: "s" 自訂格式規範會輸出 [TimeSpan.Seconds](xref:System.TimeSpan.Seconds) 屬性的值，這個屬性表示時間間隔中未納入時數、天數或分鐘數部分的完整秒數。

trans-unit.source: It returns a one-digit string value if the value of the [TimeSpan.Seconds](xref:System.TimeSpan.Seconds) property is 0 through 9, and it returns a two-digit string value if the value of the [TimeSpan.Seconds](xref:System.TimeSpan.Seconds) property ranges from 10 to 59.
trans-unit.target: 如果 [TimeSpan.Seconds](xref:System.TimeSpan.Seconds) 屬性的值為 0 到 9，則會傳回一位數的字串值；如果 [TimeSpan.Seconds](xref:System.TimeSpan.Seconds) 屬性的值為 10 到 59，則會傳回兩位數的字串值。

trans-unit.source: If the "s" custom format specifier is used alone, specify "%s" so that it is not misinterpreted as a standard format string.
trans-unit.target: 如果單獨使用 "s" 自訂格式規範，請指定 "%s"，以免被錯誤解譯為標準格式字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例提供一個實例。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, in a parsing operation, an input string that includes only a single number is interpreted as the number of days.
trans-unit.target: 通常在剖析作業中，只包含單一數字的輸入字串會解譯為天數。

trans-unit.source: You can use the "%s" custom format specifier instead to interpret the numeric string as the number of seconds.
trans-unit.target: 您可以改用 "%s" 自訂格式規範，將數值字串解譯為秒數。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例提供一個實例。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the "s" custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何使用 "s" 自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The "ss" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "ss" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "ss" custom format specifier outputs the value of the [TimeSpan.Seconds](xref:System.TimeSpan.Seconds) property, which represents the number of whole seconds in the time interval that is not included as part of its hours, days, or minutes component.
trans-unit.target: "ss" 自訂格式規範會輸出 [TimeSpan.Seconds](xref:System.TimeSpan.Seconds) 屬性的值，這個屬性表示時間間隔中未納入時數、天數或分鐘數部分的完整秒數。

trans-unit.source: For values from 0 through 9, the output string includes a leading zero.
trans-unit.target: 對於從 0 到 9 的值，輸出字串會包含前置零。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, in a parsing operation, an input string that includes only a single number is interpreted as the number of days.
trans-unit.target: 通常在剖析作業中，只包含單一數字的輸入字串會解譯為天數。

trans-unit.source: You can use the "ss" custom format specifier instead to interpret the numeric string as the number of seconds.
trans-unit.target: 您可以改用 "ss" 自訂格式規範，將數值字串解譯為秒數。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例提供一個實例。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the "ss" custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何使用 "ss" 自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The "f" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "f" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "f" custom format specifier outputs the tenths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: "f" 自訂格式規範會輸出時間間隔中的十分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: In a formatting operation, any remaining fractional digits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化作業中，會截斷其餘任何小數位數。

trans-unit.source: In a parsing operation that calls the [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) or [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) method, the input string must contain exactly one fractional digit.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) 或 [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) 方法的剖析作業中，輸入字串必須確切包含一個小數位數。

trans-unit.source: If the "f" custom format specifier is used alone, specify "%f" so that it is not misinterpreted as a standard format string.
trans-unit.target: 如果單獨使用 "f" 自訂格式規範，請指定 "%f"，以免被錯誤解譯為標準格式字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the "f" custom format specifier to display the tenths of a second in a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用 "f" 自訂格式規範，顯示 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值中的十分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: "f" is used first as the only format specifier, and then combined with the "s" specifier in a custom format string.
trans-unit.target: 首先會使用 "f" 作為唯一的格式規範，然後再放在自訂格式字串中與 "s" 規範結合。

trans-unit.source: The "ff" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "ff" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "ff" custom format specifier outputs the hundredths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: "ff" 自訂格式規範會輸出時間間隔中的百分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: In a formatting operation, any remaining fractional digits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化作業中，會截斷其餘任何小數位數。

trans-unit.source: In a parsing operation that calls the [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) or [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) method, the input string must contain exactly two fractional digits.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) 或 [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) 方法的剖析作業中，輸入字串必須確切包含兩個小數位數。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the "ff" custom format specifier to display the hundredths of a second in a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用 "ff" 自訂格式規範，顯示 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值中的百分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: "ff" is used first as the only format specifier, and then combined with the "s" specifier in a custom format string.
trans-unit.target: 首先會使用 "ff" 作為唯一的格式規範，然後再放在自訂格式字串中與 "s" 規範結合。

trans-unit.source: The "fff" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "fff" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "fff" custom format specifier (with three "f" characters) outputs the milliseconds in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: "fff" 自訂格式規範 (有三個 "f" 字元) 會輸出時間間隔中的毫秒。

trans-unit.source: In a formatting operation, any remaining fractional digits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化作業中，會截斷其餘任何小數位數。

trans-unit.source: In a parsing operation that calls the [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) or [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) method, the input string must contain exactly three fractional digits.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) 或 [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) 方法的剖析作業中，輸入字串必須確切包含三個小數位數。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the "fff" custom format specifier to display the milliseconds in a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用 "fff" 自訂格式規範，顯示 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值中的毫秒。

trans-unit.source: "fff" is used first as the only format specifier, and then combined with the "s" specifier in a custom format string.
trans-unit.target: 首先會使用 "fff" 作為唯一的格式規範，然後再放在自訂格式字串中與 "s" 規範結合。

trans-unit.source: The "ffff" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "ffff" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "ffff" custom format specifier (with four "f" characters) outputs the ten-thousandths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: "ffff" 自訂格式規範 (有四個 "f" 字元) 會輸出時間間隔中的萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: In a formatting operation, any remaining fractional digits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化作業中，會截斷其餘任何小數位數。

trans-unit.source: In a parsing operation that calls the [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) or [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) method, the input string must contain exactly four fractional digits.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) 或 [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) 方法的剖析作業中，輸入字串必須確切包含四個小數位數。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the "ffff" custom format specifier to display the ten-thousandths of a second in a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用 "ffff" 自訂格式規範，顯示 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值中的萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: "ffff" is used first as the only format specifier, and then combined with the "s" specifier in a custom format string.
trans-unit.target: 首先會使用 "ffff" 作為唯一的格式規範，然後再放在自訂格式字串中與 "s" 規範結合。

trans-unit.source: The "fffff" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "fffff" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "fffff" custom format specifier (with five "f" characters) outputs the hundred-thousandths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: "fffff" 自訂格式規範 (有五個 "f" 字元) 會輸出時間間隔中的十萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: In a formatting operation, any remaining fractional digits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化作業中，會截斷其餘任何小數位數。

trans-unit.source: In a parsing operation that calls the [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) or [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) method, the input string must contain exactly five fractional digits.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) 或 [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) 方法的剖析作業中，輸入字串必須確切包含五個小數位數。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the "fffff" custom format specifier to display the hundred-thousandths of a second in a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用 "fffff" 自訂格式規範，顯示 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值中的十萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: "fffff" is used first as the only format specifier, and then combined with the "s" specifier in a custom format string.
trans-unit.target: 首先會使用 "fffff" 作為唯一的格式規範，然後再放在自訂格式字串中與 "s" 規範結合。

trans-unit.source: The "ffffff" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "ffffff" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "ffffff" custom format specifier (with six "f" characters) outputs the millionths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: "ffffff" 自訂格式規範 (有六個 "f" 字元) 會輸出時間間隔中的百萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: In a formatting operation, any remaining fractional digits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化作業中，會截斷其餘任何小數位數。

trans-unit.source: In a parsing operation that calls the [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) or [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) method, the input string must contain exactly six fractional digits.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) 或 [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) 方法的剖析作業中，輸入字串必須確切包含六個小數位數。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the "ffffff" custom format specifier to display the millionths of a second in a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用 "ffffff" 自訂格式規範，顯示 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值中的百萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: It is used first as the only format specifier, and then combined with the "s" specifier in a custom format string.
trans-unit.target: 首先會使用它作為唯一的格式規範，然後再放在自訂格式字串中與 "s" 規範結合。

trans-unit.source: The "fffffff" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "fffffff" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "fffffff" custom format specifier (with seven "f" characters) outputs the ten-millionths of a second (or the fractional number of ticks) in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: "fffffff" 自訂格式規範 (有七個 "f" 字元) 會輸出時間間隔中的千萬分之一秒 (或刻度的小數值)。

trans-unit.source: In a parsing operation that calls the [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) or [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) method, the input string must contain exactly seven fractional digits.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) 或 [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) 方法的剖析作業中，輸入字串必須確切包含七個小數位數。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the "fffffff" custom format specifier to display the fractional number of ticks in a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用 "fffffff" 自訂格式規範，顯示 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值中刻度的小數值。

trans-unit.source: It is used first as the only format specifier, and then combined with the "s" specifier in a custom format string.
trans-unit.target: 首先會使用它作為唯一的格式規範，然後再放在自訂格式字串中與 "s" 規範結合。

trans-unit.source: The "F" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "F" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "F" custom format specifier outputs the tenths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: "F" 自訂格式規範會輸出時間間隔中的十分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: In a formatting operation, any remaining fractional digits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化作業中，會截斷其餘任何小數位數。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the time interval's tenths of a second is zero, it is not included in the result string.
trans-unit.target: 如果時間間隔十分之一秒的值為零，它就不會包含在結果字串中。

trans-unit.source: In a parsing operation that calls the [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) or [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) method, the presence of the tenths of a second digit is optional.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) 或 [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) 方法的剖析作業中，可省略十分之一秒的位數。

trans-unit.source: If the "F" custom format specifier is used alone, specify "%F" so that it is not misinterpreted as a standard format string.
trans-unit.target: 如果單獨使用 "F" 自訂格式規範，請指定 "%F"，以免被錯誤解譯為標準格式字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the "F" custom format specifier to display the tenths of a second in a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用 "F" 自訂格式規範，顯示 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值中的十分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: It also uses this custom format specifier in a parsing operation.
trans-unit.target: 它也會在剖析作業中使用此自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The "FF" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "FF" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "FF" custom format specifier outputs the hundredths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: "FF" 自訂格式規範會輸出時間間隔中的百分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: In a formatting operation, any remaining fractional digits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化作業中，會截斷其餘任何小數位數。

trans-unit.source: If there are any trailing fractional zeros, they are not included in the result string.
trans-unit.target: 如果小數點後有任何零，這些零不會包含在結果字串中。

trans-unit.source: In a parsing operation that calls the [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) or [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) method, the presence of the tenths and hundredths of a second digit is optional.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) 或 [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) 方法的剖析作業中，可省略百分之一秒的位數。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the "FF" custom format specifier to display the hundredths of a second in a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用 "FF" 自訂格式規範，顯示 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值中的百分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: It also uses this custom format specifier in a parsing operation.
trans-unit.target: 它也會在剖析作業中使用此自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The "FFF" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "FFF" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "FFF" custom format specifier (with three "F" characters) outputs the milliseconds in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: "FFF" 自訂格式規範 (有三個 "F" 字元) 會輸出時間間隔中的毫秒。

trans-unit.source: In a formatting operation, any remaining fractional digits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化作業中，會截斷其餘任何小數位數。

trans-unit.source: If there are any trailing fractional zeros, they are not included in the result string.
trans-unit.target: 如果小數點後有任何零，這些零不會包含在結果字串中。

trans-unit.source: In a parsing operation that calls the [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) or [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) method, the presence of the tenths, hundredths, and thousandths of a second digit is optional.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) 或 [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) 方法的剖析作業中，可省略十分之一秒、百分之一秒和千分之一秒的位數。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the "FFF" custom format specifier to display the thousandths of a second in a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用 "FFF" 自訂格式規範，顯示 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值中的千分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: It also uses this custom format specifier in a parsing operation.
trans-unit.target: 它也會在剖析作業中使用此自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The "FFFF" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "FFFF" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "FFFF" custom format specifier (with four "F" characters) outputs the ten-thousandths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: "FFFF" 自訂格式規範 (有四個 "F" 字元) 會輸出時間間隔中的萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: In a formatting operation, any remaining fractional digits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化作業中，會截斷其餘任何小數位數。

trans-unit.source: If there are any trailing fractional zeros, they are not included in the result string.
trans-unit.target: 如果小數點後有任何零，這些零不會包含在結果字串中。

trans-unit.source: In a parsing operation that calls the [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) or [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) method, the presence of the tenths, hundredths, thousandths, and ten-thousandths of a second digit is optional.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) 或 [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) 方法的剖析作業中，可省略十分之一秒、百分之一秒、千分之一秒和萬分之一秒的位數。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the "FFFF" custom format specifier to display the ten-thousandths of a second in a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用 "FFFF" 自訂格式規範，顯示 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值中的萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: It also uses the "FFFF" custom format specifier in a parsing operation.
trans-unit.target: 它也會在剖析作業中使用 "FFFF" 自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The "FFFFF" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "FFFFF" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "FFFFF" custom format specifier (with five "F" characters) outputs the hundred-thousandths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: "FFFFF" 自訂格式規範 (有五個 "F" 字元) 會輸出時間間隔中的十萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: In a formatting operation, any remaining fractional digits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化作業中，會截斷其餘任何小數位數。

trans-unit.source: If there are any trailing fractional zeros, they are not included in the result string.
trans-unit.target: 如果小數點後有任何零，這些零不會包含在結果字串中。

trans-unit.source: In a parsing operation that calls the [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) or [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) method, the presence of the tenths, hundredths, thousandths, ten-thousandths, and hundred-thousandths of a second digit is optional.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) 或 [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) 方法的剖析作業中，可省略十分之一秒、百分之一秒、千分之一秒、萬分之一秒和十萬分之一秒的位數。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the "FFFFF" custom format specifier to display the hundred-thousandths of a second in a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用 "FFFFF" 自訂格式規範，顯示 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值中的十萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: It also uses the "FFFFF" custom format specifier in a parsing operation.
trans-unit.target: 它也會在剖析作業中使用 "FFFFF" 自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The "FFFFFF" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "FFFFFF" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "FFFFFF" custom format specifier (with six "F" characters) outputs the millionths of a second in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: "FFFFFF" 自訂格式規範 (有六個 "F" 字元) 會輸出時間間隔中的百萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: In a formatting operation, any remaining fractional digits are truncated.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化作業中，會截斷其餘任何小數位數。

trans-unit.source: If there are any trailing fractional zeros, they are not included in the result string.
trans-unit.target: 如果小數點後有任何零，這些零不會包含在結果字串中。

trans-unit.source: In a parsing operation that calls the [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) or [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) method, the presence of the tenths, hundredths, thousandths, ten-thousandths, hundred-thousandths, and millionths of a second digit is optional.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) 或 [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) 方法的剖析作業中，可省略十分之一秒、百分之一秒、千分之一秒、萬分之一秒、十萬分之一秒和百萬分之一秒的位數。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the "FFFFFF" custom format specifier to display the millionths of a second in a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用 "FFFFFF" 自訂格式規範，顯示 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值中的百萬分之一秒。

trans-unit.source: It also uses this custom format specifier in a parsing operation.
trans-unit.target: 它也會在剖析作業中使用此自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: The "FFFFFFF" custom format specifier
trans-unit.target: "FFFFFFF" 自訂格式規範

trans-unit.source: The "FFFFFFF" custom format specifier (with seven "F" characters) outputs the ten-millionths of a second (or the fractional number of ticks) in a time interval.
trans-unit.target: "FFFFFFF" 自訂格式規範 (有七個 "F" 字元) 會輸出時間間隔中的千萬分之一秒 (或刻度的小數值)。

trans-unit.source: If there are any trailing fractional zeros, they are not included in the result string.
trans-unit.target: 如果小數點後有任何零，這些零不會包含在結果字串中。

trans-unit.source: In a parsing operation that calls the [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) or [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) method, the presence of the seven fractional digits in the input string is optional.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 [TimeSpan.ParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.ParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider)) 或 [TimeSpan.TryParseExact](xref:System.TimeSpan.TryParseExact(System.String,System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.TimeSpanStyles,System.TimeSpan@)) 方法的剖析作業中，輸入字串中可省略七個小數位數。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the "FFFFFFF" custom format specifier to display the fractional parts of a second in a [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用 "FFFFFFF" 自訂格式規範，顯示 [TimeSpan](xref:System.TimeSpan) 值中的小數秒部分。

trans-unit.source: It also uses this custom format specifier in a parsing operation.
trans-unit.target: 它也會在剖析作業中使用此自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: Other Characters
trans-unit.target: 其他字元

trans-unit.source: Any other unescaped character in a format string, including a white-space character, is interpreted as a custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 格式字串中任何其他未逸出的字元 (包括空白字元)，都會解譯為自訂格式規範。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the presence of any other unescaped character results in a [FormatException](xref:System.FormatException).
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，其他任何未逸出的字元都會引發 [FormatException](xref:System.FormatException)。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to include a literal character in a format string:
trans-unit.target: 有兩個方式可以在格式字串中納入常值字元：

trans-unit.source: Enclose it in single quotation marks (the literal string delimiter).
trans-unit.target: 用單引號 (常值字串分隔符號) 括住字元。

trans-unit.source: Precede it with a backslash ("\"), which is interpreted as an escape character.
trans-unit.target: 在字元前面加上反斜線 ("\")，這樣就會解譯為逸出字元。

trans-unit.source: This means that, in C#, the format string must either be @-quoted, or the literal character must be preceded by an additional backslash.
trans-unit.target: 亦即在 C# 中，格式字串必須括以 @-quoted,，或必須在常值字元前額外加上一道反斜線。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, you may have to use conditional logic to include an escaped literal in a format string.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，您可能需要使用條件邏輯，才能在格式字串中包含逸出的常值。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses conditional logic to include a sign symbol for negative time intervals.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將使用條件邏輯包含代表負時間間隔的正負號。

trans-unit.source: .NET does not define a grammar for separators in time intervals.
trans-unit.target: .NET 不會定義時間間隔中分隔符號的文法。

trans-unit.source: This means that the separators between days and hours, hours and minutes, minutes and seconds, and seconds and fractions of a second must all be treated as character literals in a format string.
trans-unit.target: 這表示天與小時、小時與分鐘、分鐘與秒以及秒與小數秒之間的分隔符號，都必須以格式字串中的字元常值方式處理。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses both the escape character and the single quote to define a custom format string that includes the word "minutes" in the output string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使用逸出字元和單引號，定義會在輸出字串中加上 "minutes" 一詞的自訂格式字串。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱

trans-unit.source: [Formatting types](formatting-types.md)
trans-unit.target: [格式化類型](formatting-types.md)

trans-unit.source: [Standard TimeSpan format strings](standard-timespan.md)
trans-unit.target: [標準 TimeSpan 格式字串](standard-timespan.md)
